name: FirmWare
description:
In FirmWare you control a ball that is trying avoid bullets from the enemies. However you can activate your secret ability to burn away the competition. However the more you use it the weaker you'll get. 

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Activate Ability

Credits
